metadata.description: Naruse， who works at a leisure facility， has to keep an eye on the incompetent new-guy Kousaka， who’s been told to pull out weeds. Kousaka adores Naruse， and the night before his final day， he realizes just how deep his feelings go... Kousaka’s in love， and when he gets drunk， he lets Naruse know by......!
metadata.name: Carrot and Stick (Yaoi Manga)
